text: "Feed My Frankenstein" is a 1991 song by originally released by British hard rock band Zodiac Mindwarp and the Love Reaction for their second studio album Hoodlum Thunder. It was covered by Alice Cooper for his album Hey Stoopid. It went to number 27 in the United States and was featured in the 1992 movie Wayne's World. ==References== Category:1991 songs Category:Alice Cooper songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Feed My Frankenstein
